page.title: 04TRADE_SHOPPING IN TIPTREE
page.content: Tiptree caters well for the needs of the local people.There are several supermarkets along the main street which is called Church Road.The Post Office has moved up and down Church Road several times over the last 15 years but has been at its present site since 1981.Because of the population explosion of recent times there has been a campaign for a Crown Post Office which has been unsuccessful. The only shopping facility that Tiptree really lacks in 1985 is a furniture store.These items can be bought in Witham,7 miles away, Colchester, 12 miles,Maldon 10 miles and Chelmsford, (The county town of Essex),17 miles distant.
